insurancemodel

Class ContentPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • insurancemodel.Policy
      • insurancemodel.ContentPolicy

  • public class ContentPolicy
extends Policy
    This is a class to create and control all content insurance policies. It contains details of the insured value of the content and the risk of insuring the contents.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class insurancemodel.Policy

        policyNo, policyYear

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContentPolicy

        public ContentPolicy(int policyYear,
                     java.lang.String policyNo,
                     double newInsuredValue,
                     double newInsuranceRisk)
              throws IllegalPolicyException
        Constructor for the ContentPolicy class. Takes variables that are inherited from the Policy class and that are parsed in from the InputData class.
        Parameters:
        policyYear - inherited int variable from Policy.java that is the year of issue for this policy
        policyNo - inherited String variable from Policy.java that is the unique number of this policy
        newInsuredValue - double variable that is the amount the contents are insured for
        newInsuranceRisk - double variable that is the risk posed to the company in accepting this policy. Value between 1 (high risk) and 0 (low risk).
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - Catches any policy number or years that are out-width their bounds.

    • Method Detail

      • getInsuredValue

        public double getInsuredValue()
        Accessor method for retrieving the amount the contents are insured for.
        Returns:
        returns a double value that contains the value that the contents are insured for, for this ContentPolicy object.

      • getInsuranceRisk

        public double getInsuranceRisk()
        Accessor method for retrieving the risk of insurance for this policy.
        Returns:
        returns a double value that contains the insurance risk for this ContentPolicy object

      • setInsuredValue

        public void setInsuredValue(double newInsuredValue)
        Mutator method for altering the value the contents are insured for.
        Parameters:
        newInsuredValue - The new value the contents are insured for to replace the old value.

      • setInsuranceRisk

        public void setInsuranceRisk(double newInsuranceRisk)
        Mutator method for altering the estimated risk for this insurance policy.
        Parameters:
        newInsuranceRisk - The new insurance risk value to replace the old insurance risk value
